attacks.name: ROCKET_LAUNCHER_OPT1
attacks.description: Choose 1 target on any square exactly 1 move away. Move onto that squareand give the target 1 damage and 2 marks.

attacks.name: ROCKET_LAUNCHER_OPT2
attacks.description: During the basic effect, deal 1 damage to every player on your target's original square â€“ including the target, even if you move it.

baseAttack.name: ROCKET_LAUNCHER_BASE
baseAttack.description: Move 1 or 2 squares. This effect can be used either before or after the basic effect.
